name: Guide - Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3
description:
The Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3 Guide is the one and only GODLIKE way to have all of your UMvC3 needs in the palm of your hands at all times, including when you have no network connection! This is the ONLY guide that includes all of the moves and hyper combos for all 50 characters, beginner, intermediate, and advanced combos for each and every character, and a notes section so you can keep matchup notes or create your own combos and save them!

That's right - this is the guide for the updated UMvC3 game that everyone has been asking me to create based off the success of my other fighting game apps!

This includes all of the data for both the original 38 cast members - as well as the 12 new characters introduced in UMvC3. All of the updated Frame Data has been included for all of the original characters, as well as new moves for those who received some move buffs!

If you like this app please give it a good rating!!! Also check out my other fighting game apps on the marketplace!

And the best part is, you can look at this virtually while you are playing a match! There is no need to pause the game to look through menus, or exit online versus mode just to look at moves. You don't have to go look on your computer or flip through pages to find out some combos or information. You just have to look at your device right next to you! You can do it between matches, at the load screens, WHENEVER!

There is absolutely NO need to have any wireless or network connection once you have this app. You can use it at any tournament in a hotel, in someone's basement, or on the subway to your buddies house to play UMvC3, all where signals can be weak!

The Retina Display images give the crisp look you desire on your 4th gen iOS devices!

Below is the list of features that are included in the app for each of the 50 characters.

* Vitals page, with information including health, assists, and X-Factor enhancements
* Special Moves
* Hyper Combos
* 7 total combos (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced), for a total of 350 combos!
* Frame and Damage data for all 50 characters!
* Notes section so you can take seperate matchup notes or specific combos

So step your game up and grab this app! Put your friends on blast by showing off how much more knowledge you have about UMvC3 than they do. OCV an entire team at your next tourney!

If you want to play like the pros, you have to have the knowledge of the pros! There is no better way to have it than in the palm of your hands at all times, even if you are in an area that is pitch black with no wireless signal!

This app has been created by the diehard fighter fan, for the diehard fighter fan. Maybe we'll even run into eachother on Xbox Live or PSN. It will be constantly maintained when new information or characters become available.

SO GET YOUR ULTIMATE MARVEL VS CAPCOM 3 STRATEGY GUIDE ON!!
